title.en: A Prayer to Tsarchen Dorje Chang

text.en: Emaho!
text.en-trans: emaho

text.en: Embodiment of all the buddhas’ compassion,
text.en-trans: sangye kün gyi tukjé chik dü pa

text.en: Vajradhara in person, Tsarpa Lord of Dharma,
text.en-trans: dorjé chang ngö tsarpa chökyi jé

text.en: I offer you the blossoming white lotus of my heart
text.en-trans: nying ü pekar zhepé tser chö dé

text.en: And pray to you with unshakeable, heartfelt devotion.
text.en-trans: miché nying né güpé solwa deb

text.en: The crown adornment of all the Snowy Land’s scholars and adepts
text.en-trans: gangchen khé dang drubpé tsuk gi gyen

text.en: Was Virūpa, whose teachings passed to the noble Sakya patriarchs
text.en-trans: birwé zhal gyi dampa sakyapa

text.en: In an aural lineage of private instruction.
text.en-trans: jetsün gongmé nyengyü lobshé kyi

text.en: Lord Tsarpa, who imbibed this nectar of profound meaning,
text.en-trans: zab dön dütsi nyöpé tsarpa jé

text.en: Heroic father Losal Gyatso, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: pa gö losal gyatsor solwa deb

text.en: Master of the one-to-one transmission of Golden Dharmas
text.en-trans: naropa dang dramzé chok sé dang

text.en: Of yidam deities, ḍākinīs, dharma guardians and the like,
text.en-trans: ra chen drok mi lasok lek gyüpé

text.en: Which was passed from Nāropa and the brahmin Vararuci,
text.en-trans: yidam daki chökyong lasokpé

text.en: Down through the great Ra, Drokmi and others—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: ser chö chik gyü dakpor solwa deb

text.en: You captivated minds with the purity of your ethical training,
text.en-trans: labpé tsultrim dakpé yitrok ching

text.en: Were unimpeded as you entered and rose from a hundred samādhis,
text.en-trans: tingdzin go gyar juk dang tokpamé

text.en: And in the great treasury of your threefold wisdom, you were Mañjughoṣa in person—
text.en-trans: sherab sum gyi terchen jampé yang

text.en: Glorious and supreme guru, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: palden lama chok la solwa deb

text.en: Skilled in exposition, you attracted myriads of brilliant minds,
text.en-trans: ché khé loden jewé yi ga guk

text.en: In debate you crushed the mountain of your adversaries to dust,
text.en-trans: tsöpé pé gol drakri chemar tak

text.en: And through composition illuminated the peak of Buddha’s teachings—
text.en-trans: tsompé tubten lhünpo salwar jé

text.en: To you whose perfect wisdom was unbounded, I pray.
text.en-trans: khyen rab pata yé la solwa deb

text.en: In your vast love, you acted only for the welfare of others;
text.en-trans: tsewa chenpö zhendön bazhik chö

text.en: With your power and strength, you crushed Māra’s hordes.
text.en-trans: tutob nüpé dü dé chemar tak

text.en: You constantly beheld the delighted faces of the yidam deities.
text.en-trans: yidam lha yi gyé zhal taktu jal

text.en: And actualized all the signs of approach and accomplishment—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: nyendrub tak tsé ngöngyur solwa deb

text.en: Through the generation phase, all appearances arose in the form of the deity,
text.en-trans: kyepé rimpé chir nang lha kur shar

text.en: And through the perfection phase, the motions of winds and essences dissolved.
text.en-trans: dzokpé rimpé lung tik drö nam tim

text.en: You overcame the three obscurations together with their habitual traces,
text.en-trans: drib sum bakchak dangché pangpa dang

text.en: And perfected the qualities of the paths and stages—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: salam yönten dzok la solwa deb

text.en: King of all the vajra-holders of this degenerate age,
text.en-trans: nyikdü dorjé dzinpa kün gyi gyal

text.en: Vajra guru, the thought of whom is sufficient, Lord Tsarpa—
text.en-trans: dorjé lama dren chok tsarpa jer

text.en: As I supplicate you, constantly with unshakeable devotion,
text.en-trans: miché güpé taktu soldeb na

text.en: Bestow a mighty river of blessings here and now, I pray.
text.en-trans: jinlab wangchen danta kur du sol

text.en: Cause me to realize the nature of awareness-emptiness directly,
text.en-trans: riktong chönyi ngönsum tokpa dang

text.en: Dissolve the fourfold motion and actualize the four kāyas,
text.en-trans: drö zhi tim né ku zhi ngön du jé

text.en: Spontaneously accomplish my own and others’ aims,
text.en-trans: rangzhen dön nyi lhün gyi drubpa yi

text.en: And become your very equal, O sovereign of Dharma!
text.en-trans: chö kyi gyalpo khyö dang tsungpar shok
